title: This Is My Dad. He's Dead.
description: Ben Morgan wants a normal family life. There's just one problem - he's dead.Ben Morgan is not going to take his premature death lying down. If it had been a Monday, perhaps he might have felt differently – death often being preferable to a Monday – but it's Thursday. As a loving husband and proud father, Ben is determined to return to his family. But it's complicated, this afterlife.Can Ben find a way to communicate with his family? Should he even try to do so, given the potential implications for both them and him? Meanwhile, can his wife, Frankie, cope with the dual misfortune of her husband's death and a visit from her mother?With laugh-out-loud moments from a cast of amusing characters, "THIS IS MY DAD. HE'S DEAD." is a funny and heart-warming tale, perfect for anyone who has loved and died and then tried to return to their family. And anyone else.
author: D.C. Barclay
